about_the_game:
Yell At Each Other Online

Welcome to Yell At Each Other Online, the game where you’re a stickman, and the only thing louder than your microphone is the regret of joining the session. Think you’re here to win? Wrong. You’re here to scream, shout, and lose your voice yelling at strangers in the most pointless yet strangely satisfying way possible. Show them who's boss by being the loudest in the room and yell at your hearts content.

Features (if you can call them that):

  • Big Multiplayer Energy – Host or join sessions with over 40 players. That’s right, FORTY people yelling over each other. It’s as chaotic as it sounds.

  • Pointless Sandbox Fun – A map with random stuff like a stage for you to yell on, and a minefield for… reasons? We don’t know. Just walk through it and hope for the best.

  • Stickman Shenanigans – Be a stickman. Pick your outfit. And it's time to YELL.

  • Microphone Mayhem – Use your mic to make your mark, whether it’s a heartfelt monologue, a primal scream, or something in between. Not sure what to say? Just YELL.

  • Rules? What rules..? – No scripts, no objectives, no problem! Do whatever you want—it’s a free-for-all of stupidity.

Why Play This?

Because life is stressful, and sometimes you just need to scream at strangers while looking like a stickman. Think of it as therapy, but way less productive and significantly more chaotic.

Yell At Each Other Online isn’t about winning; it’s about making terrible decisions, being loud, and having a good laugh at how ridiculous it all is. So, grab your mic, embrace the absurdity, and get ready to yell at strangers. Or don’t. We’re not your mom.

Are you ready to yell your lungs out?

Yell at strangers today, all day!

name: Yell At Each Other Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May work with even lower specs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Ever feel like yelling at strangers without the risk of getting kicked out of public spaces? Now you can! Join 40 loudmouths in a chaotic sandbox where volume beats logic. Scream responsibly!
